stories.text:
I'm using Firefox + 1Password classic (that does not require syncing all your passwords with the cloud)

However today it just stopped working, I think 1Password guys just broke sth by accident or on purpose

Do you know any good alternative that works on Mac OS + IOS and syncs locally without "the cloud"?
stories.title: Ask HN: 1Password Alternatives
Antarctica was once a rainforest. Could it be again?

stories.text:
I want to just plug in a bunch of symptoms, maybe like a Todo-style checklist, one symptom per line, and then say, 'Tell me what I have, doc'.

e.g.

  - persistent cough
  - birth of daughter last year
  - cracked rib
  - cough getting worse
  - hurts to breath
  - excruciating to cough
  - pain worse on right
  - achy body
  - stiff joints
  - pain in ears when i wear a hat
  - pain when I sleep on my side
  - nose gets sore when i wear sunglasses
I suspect it does not exist or cannot be found because: - it's illegal - AMA sued whoever tried it - it just can't be found, b/c of spam sites - it exists but you need to be a professional researcher/doctor/etc. to gain access.

I will post the actual diagnosis tomorrow. This is not me, this is from the internet. A google will find it if you're curious.
stories.title: Ask HN: Is there a simple online medical diagnosis tool?
A 8-year effort finds that much cancer research can’t be replicated
The Physiology of Treading Water Efficiently
